verses.verse: <S%G5124><s%> But This <S%G1161><s%> Know Thou, <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Last <S%G2078><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Will Be Present <S%G1764><s%> Times <S%G2540><s%> Difficult; <S%G5467><s%>

<S%G2071><s%> For Will Be <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Lovers Of Self, <S%G5367><s%> Lovers Of Money, <S%G5366><s%> Vaunting, <S%G213><s%> Proud, <S%G5244><s%> Evil Speakers. <S%G989><s%> To Parents <S%G1118><s%> Disobedient, <S%G545><s%> Unthankful, <S%G884><s%> Unholy, <S%G462><s%>
Without Natural Affection, <S%G794><s%> Implacable, <S%G786><s%> Slanderers, <S%G1228><s%> Incontinent, <S%G193><s%> Savage, <S%G434><s%> Not Lovers Of Good, <S%G865><s%>
Betrayers, <S%G4273><s%> Headlong, <S%G4312><s%> Puffed Up, <S%G5187><s%> Lovers Of Pleasure <S%G5369><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> Lovers Of God; <S%G5377><s%>

Having <S%G2192><s%> A Form <S%G3446><s%> Of Piety, <S%G2150><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> Of It <S%G846><s%> Denying : <S%G720><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> These <S%G5128><s%> Turn Away From. <S%G665><s%>

<S%G1537><s%> <S%G5130><s%> For Of These <S%G1063><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Are Entering <S%G1744><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Houses <S%G3614><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Leading Captive <S%G162><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Silly Women <S%G1133><s%> Laden <S%G4987><s%> With Sins, <S%G266><s%> Led Away <S%G71><s%> By Lusts <S%G1939><s%> Various, <S%G4164><s%>
Always <S%G3842><s%> Learning <S%G3129><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Never <S%G3368><s%> To The <S%G1519><s%> Knowledge <S%G1922><s%> Of The Truth <S%G225><s%> To Come <S%G2064><s%> Able. <S%G1410><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> <S%G5158><s%> Now In The Way <S%G1161><s%> Jannes <S%G2389><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Jambres <S%G2387><s%> Withstood <S%G436><s%> Moses, <S%G3475><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> Withstand <S%G436><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth, <S%G225><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Utterly Corrupted <S%G2704><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Mind, <S%G3563><s%> Found Worthless <S%G96><s%> As Regards <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Faith. <S%G4102><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Shall Not Advance <S%G4298><s%> <S%G1909><s%> Farther, <S%G4119><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Folly <S%G454><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> Fully Manifest <S%G1552><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> To All, <S%G3956><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Of Those <S%G1565><s%> Became. <S%G1096><s%>

<S%G4771><s%> But Thou <S%G1161><s%> Hast Closely Followed <S%G3877><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Teaching, <S%G1319><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Conduct, <S%G72><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Purpose, <S%G4286><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Patience, <S%G3115><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Love, <S%G26><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Endurance, <S%G5281><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Persecutions, <S%G1375><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sufferings : <S%G3804><s%> Such <S%G3634><s%> As To Me <S%G3427><s%> Happened <S%G1096><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Antioch, <S%G490><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Iconium, <S%G2430><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Lystra; <S%G3082><s%> What Manner Of <S%G3634><s%> Persecutions <S%G1375><s%> I Endured; <S%G5297><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Delivered <S%G4506><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Indeed <S%G1161><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Wish <S%G2309><s%> Piously <S%G2153><s%> To Live <S%G2198><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Will Be Persecuted. <S%G1377><s%>

<S%G4190><s%> But Wicked <S%G1161><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Imposters <S%G1114><s%> Shall Advance <S%G4298><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Worse, <S%G5501><s%> Misleading <S%G4105><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Being Mislead. <S%G4105><s%>

<S%G4771><s%> But Thou <S%G1161><s%> Abide <S%G3306><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The Things <S%G3739><s%> Thou Didst Learn, <S%G3129><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wast Assured Of, <S%G4104><s%> Having Known <S%G1492><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> Thou Didst Learn Them; <S%G3129><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> From <S%G575><s%> A Babe <S%G1025><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sacred <S%G2413><s%> Letters <S%G1121><s%> Thou Hast Known, <S%G1492><s%> Which Are <S%G3588><s%> Able <S%G1410><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> To Make Wise <S%G4679><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Salvation, <S%G4991><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Every <S%G3956><s%> Scripture Is <S%G1124><s%> God Inspired <S%G2315><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Profitable <S%G5624><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> Teaching, <S%G1319><s%> For <S%G4314><s%>, Conviction, <S%G1650><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> Correction, <S%G1882><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> Discipline <S%G3809><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Righteousness; <S%G1343><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> Complete <S%G739><s%> May Be <S%G5600><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Man, <S%G444><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Work <S%G2041><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> Fully Fitted. <S%G1822><s%>
